name: lingarr
tagline: A self-hosted platform for language learning and vocabulary building
description: Lingarr is a self-hosted language learning and translation platform that helps users build vocabulary through spaced repetition and quizzes. It supports importing phrases and integrates with translation APIs.

features.title: Language Learning
features.description: Vocabulary building, Spaced repetition, Quiz system. Learn languages effectively

features.title: REST API
features.description: API support, Phrase import, Multi-language. Build your vocabulary database

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Privacy-focused, Custom content, Personal progress. Own your language learning data

features.title: Spaced Repetition
features.description: SRS algorithm, Optimal review timing, Memory retention. Learn efficiently

features.title: Quiz System
features.description: Multiple formats, Progress tracking, Difficulty adjustment. Test your knowledge

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Import phrases, Context examples, Audio support. Build comprehensive vocabulary

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Learning statistics, Streak tracking, Achievement system. Monitor your improvement

features.title: Multi
features.description: Support for many languages, Parallel learning, Language pairs. Learn multiple languages
